about_the_game:
Embark on an exciting journey for the whole family with Brick Breaker Pro! This beloved classic breakout game is not just about breaking bricks - it's a fun-filled adventure suitable for all ages. Get ready for hours of entertainment in a vibrant world bursting with color and excitement.

Brick Breaker Pro offers a simple yet addictive gameplay experience that everyone can enjoy. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just starting out, you'll find yourself immersed in the action-packed fun. Aim, shoot, and watch as the bricks crumble before your eyes, earning points and unlocking new challenges along the way.

And that's not all - Brick Breaker Pro is constantly evolving with new features and updates. Soon, we'll be adding an incredible 5000 achievements to keep you motivated and engaged like never before. So gather the family, unleash your inner brick-breaking champion, and let the adventure begin!

content_descriptors.notes: There is no mature content in 'Bricks Breaker Pro.' This game is designed to be family-friendly and suitable for players of all ages. It does not contain depictions of violence, sexual content, drug and alcohol use, or any themes that might cause sensitivity such as sexual assault, non-consensual sex, self-harm, etc. 'Bricks Breaker Pro' aims to provide a safe and enjoyable gaming experience for everyone

legal_notice:
Brick Breaker Pro" © 2024 by ShayanXtreme. All rights reserved.

This game is made with love for everyone to enjoy. Please remember:

Everything in the game (like pictures, sounds, and text) is owned by me, ShayanXtreme. Please don't copy or share it without asking.
You can recognize "Brick Breaker Pro" by its special name and logo. If you want to use them somewhere, you need to get my permission first.
I've worked hard to make this game fun and safe for everyone, but I can't promise it will be perfect or suit everyone's needs. Also, I can't be responsible if something doesn't work right.
By playing "Brick Breaker Pro," you're agreeing to these simple rules. If you're not okay with them, please don't download or play the game.
Hope you have a lot of fun!
name: Bricks Breaker Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9500 GT / ATI(AMD) Radeon HD4650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 24 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 730 / AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 MB available space

short_description: Brick Breaker Pro offers classic arcade fun with a modern twist! Break bricks, set high scores, and unlock achievements in this vibrant and addictive game.
